entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Rain mixed with snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
